verses.verse: וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat, Also I in the first לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַמָּדִ֑י <S%H4075><s%> ham-ma-Di; the Mede עָמְדִ֛י <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Di arose לְמַחֲזִ֥יק <S%H2388><s%> le-ma-cha-Zik to confirm וּלְמָע֖וֹז <S%H4581><s%> u-le-ma-'oz and to strengthen לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now אֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met thee the truth אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> 'ag-Gid And now will I shew לָ֑ךְ Lach; הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold עוֹד֩ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od more שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah yet three מְלָכִ֜ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings עֹמְדִ֣ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim Behold there shall stand up לְפָרַ֗ס <S%H6539><s%> le-fa-Ras, in Persia וְהָֽרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> ve-ha-re-vi-'I and the fourth יַעֲשִׁ֤יר <S%H6238><s%> ya-'a-Shir richer עֹֽשֶׁר־ <S%H6239><s%> 'o-sher- shall be far גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> ga-dOl than [they] all מִכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol, all וּכְחֶזְקָת֣וֹ <S%H2393><s%> u-che-chez-ka-To and by his strength בְעָשְׁר֔וֹ <S%H6239><s%> ve-'a-she-Ro, through his riches יָעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> ya-'Ir he shall stir up הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol, the whole אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> mal-Chut all against the realm יָוָֽן׃ <S%H3120><s%> ya-Van. of Grecia

וְעָמַ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-Mad shall stand up מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor; And a mighty וּמָשַׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> u-ma-Shal that shall rule מִמְשָׁ֣ל <S%H4474><s%> mi-Shal dominion רַ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, with great וְעָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and do כִּרְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7522><s%> kir-tzo-No. according to his will

וּכְעָמְדוֹ֙ <S%H5975><s%> u-che-'a-me-Do And when he shall stand up תִּשָּׁבֵ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> tish-sha-Ver shall be broken מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-To, his kingdom וְתֵחָ֕ץ <S%H2673><s%> ve-te-Chatz and shall be divided לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-Ba' toward the four רוּח֣וֹת <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chot winds הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor לְאַחֲרִית֗וֹ <S%H319><s%> le-'a-cha-ri-To, and not to his posterity וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor כְמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <S%H4915><s%> che-ma-she-Lo nor according to his dominion אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מָשָׁ֔ל <S%H4910><s%> ma-Shal, which he ruled כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תִנָּתֵשׁ֙ <S%H5428><s%> tin-na-Tesh shall be plucked up מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-To, for his kingdom וְלַאֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> ve-la-'a-che-Rim even for others מִלְּבַד־ <S%H905><s%> mil-le-vad- alone אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. another

וְיֶחֱזַ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> ve-ye-che-Zak shall be strong מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And the king הַנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev of the south וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at שָׂרָ֑יו <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rav; and [one] of his princes וְיֶחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> ve-ye-che-Zak and he shall be strong עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over וּמָשָׁ֔ל <S%H4910><s%> u-ma-Shal, above him and have dominion מִמְשָׁ֥ל <S%H4474><s%> mi-Shal dominion רַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> rav [shall be] a great מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4475><s%> mem-shal-To. his dominion

וּלְקֵ֤ץ <S%H7093><s%> u-le-Ketz And in the end שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim of years יִתְחַבָּ֔רוּ <S%H2266><s%> yit-chab-Ba-ru, they shall join themselves together וּבַ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> u-Vat daughter מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- for the king's הַנֶּ֗גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev, of the south תָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech to the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-Fon, of the north לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to make מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> mei-sha-Rim; an agreement וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תַעְצֹ֞ר <S%H6113><s%> ta'-Tzor but she shall not retain כּ֣וֹחַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach the power הַזְּר֗וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> haz-ze-Ro-a', of the arm וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יַעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod neither shall he stand וּזְרֹע֔וֹ <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-ro-'O, nor his arm וְתִנָּתֵ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-tin-na-Ten but she shall be given up הִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> hi who וּמְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H935><s%> u-me-vi-'Ei-ha and they that brought וְהַיֹּ֣לְדָ֔הּ <S%H3205><s%> ve-hai-Yo-le-Dah, her and he that begat וּמַחֲזִקָ֖הּ <S%H2388><s%> u-ma-cha-zi-Kah her and he that strengthened בָּעִתִּֽים׃ <S%H6256><s%> ba-'it-Tim. her in [these] times

וְעָמַ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-Mad shall [one] stand up מִנֵּ֥צֶר <S%H5342><s%> min-Ne-tzer But out of a branch שָׁרָשֶׁ֖יהָ <S%H8328><s%> sha-ra-Shei-ha of her roots כַּנּ֑וֹ <S%H3653><s%> kan-No; in his estate וְיָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo which shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> ha-Cha-yil, with an army וְיָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo and shall enter בְּמָעוֹז֙ <S%H4581><s%> be-ma-'Oz into the fortress מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech of the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-Fon, of the north וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and shall deal בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem וְהֶחֱזִֽיק׃ <S%H2388><s%> ve-he-che-Zik. against them and shall prevail

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam Also אֱ‍ ֽלֹהֵיהֶ֡ם <S%H430><s%> 'elo-hei-Hem their gods עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with נְסִֽכֵיהֶם֩ <S%H5257><s%> ne-si-chei-Hem with their princes עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with כְּלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei vessels חֶמְדָּתָ֜ם <S%H2532><s%> chem-da-Tam [and] with their precious כֶּ֧סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef of silver וְזָהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav and of gold בַּשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> bash-she-Vi captives יָבִ֣א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi And shall also carry מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; into Egypt וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu his part שָׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim [more] years יַעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod, and he shall continue מִמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> mi-Me-lech than the king הַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-Fon of the north

וּבָ֗א <S%H935><s%> u-Va, shall come בְּמַלְכוּת֙ <S%H4438><s%> be-mal-Chut into [his] kingdom מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech So the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev, of the south וְשָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav and shall return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H127><s%> ad-ma-To. into his own land

וּבְנֹו uv-nov כוּבָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav afflicted קיִתְגָּר֗וּ <S%H1624><s%> yit-ga-Ru, shall be stirred up וְאָסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> ve-'a-se-Fu and shall assemble הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mOn a multitude חֲיָלִ֣ים <S%H2428><s%> cha-ya-Lim forces רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, of great וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> u-Va and [one] shall certainly ב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> Vo come וְשָׁטַ֣ף <S%H7857><s%> ve-sha-Taf and overflow וְעָבָ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var; and pass through וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Sho then shall he return; וְיִתְגָּרוּ ve-yit-ga-ru כוְיִתְגָּרֶ֖ה <S%H1624><s%> ve-yit-ga-Reh will mobilize קעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against; מָעֻזָּה ma-'uz-zah כמָעֻזֹּֽו׃ <S%H4581><s%> ma-'uz-Zo. force ק

וְיִתְמַרְמַר֙ <S%H4843><s%> ve-yit-mar-Mar shall be moved with choler מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev, of the south וְיָצָ֕א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and shall come forth וְנִלְחַ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-Cham and fight עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech with him [even] with the king הַצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-Fon; of the north וְהֶעֱמִיד֙ <S%H5975><s%> ve-he-'e-Mid and he shall set forth הָמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon multitude רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, a great וְנִתַּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-nit-Tan shall be given הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> he-ha-Mon but the multitude בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. into his hand

וְנִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> ve-nis-Sa [And] when he hath taken away הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> he-ha-Mon the multitude; יָרוּם ya-rum כוְרָ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> ve-Ram bring up קלְבָב֑וֹ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vo; his heart וְהִפִּ֛יל <S%H5307><s%> ve-hip-Pil and he shall cast down רִבֹּא֖וֹת <S%H7239><s%> rib-bo-'ot [many] ten thousands וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo he will not יָעֽוֹז׃ <S%H5810><s%> ya-'oz. but he shall not be strengthened

וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav shall return מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech For the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-Fon, of the north וְהֶעֱמִ֣יד <S%H5975><s%> ve-he-'e-Mid and shall set forth הָמ֔וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon, a multitude רַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> rav greater מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- than הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon; than the former וּלְקֵ֨ץ <S%H7093><s%> u-le-Ketz after הָֽעִתִּ֤ים <S%H6256><s%> ha-'it-Tim certain שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years יָ֣בוֹא <S%H935><s%> Ya-Vo and shall certainly ב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> Vo, come בְּחַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> be-Cha-yil army גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol with a great וּבִרְכ֥וּשׁ <S%H7399><s%> u-vir-Chush riches רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> Rav. and with much

וּבָעִתִּ֣ים <S%H6256><s%> u-va-'it-Tim And in those times הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem, those רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim there shall many יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du stand up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech against the king הַנֶּ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev; of the south וּבְנֵ֣י׀ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei afflicted פָּרִיצֵ֣י <S%H6530><s%> pa-ri-Tzei the violent עַמְּךָ֗ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha, of thy people יִֽנַּשְּׂא֛וּ <S%H5375><s%> yin-nas-se-'U shall exalt לְהַעֲמִ֥יד <S%H5975><s%> le-ha-'a-Mid themselves to establish חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> cha-Zon the vision וְנִכְשָֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H3782><s%> ve-nich-Sha-lu. but they shall fall
